response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Given its high worth, I believe it would also be a significant asset for you. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you further.", "product_price": 1100000}
